website_summaries.verdict: Whether you appreciate spearmint or honeysuckle, Aira Candles are an all-natural way to light and freshen your home with over 110 hr. of burn time.
pros: Sweet lime and earthy woodsy scent
Available in a wide range of fragrances
cons: Quality soy candles like these aren’t cheap

customer_reviews.title: "What you burn is what you breathe" Choose Wisely
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle and appreciate that every time I light it I know that's the scent it's not only wonderful but healthy as well. It does not burn toxic elements into the air . I suffer from headaches from store-bought candles and always ended up with an overwhelming sent and inevitably a bad headache. This did not happen with this candle and that is much appreciated because I love to enjoy candles in my home. I recommend the purchase of these candles as I will continue to be a customer
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Piscitelli

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE synthetic fragrances abound
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this candle. Before lighting it, I thought it smelled great and looked forward to the next opportunity to use it. Alas, I lit it in my laundry room where we also keep our cats' litter boxes. It was definitely phony synthetic chemicals I was confronted with. It stung my sinuses and so I blew it out immediately. I guess I can use it outside to repel insects and anything else with a sense of smell. :{
customer_reviews.author: Magwito

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Lavender & Bergamot and it has a horrible scent. It generated a gag affect it was so bad. Maybe it was a bad batch since others like it. But I would never order this again and threw the candle away. Revised review: the seller sent me a new candle and I love the scent. I highly recommend this candle and company.
customer_reviews.author: Mariabl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy the lemon orange
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these candles because specifically they were soy. I was selling my house and wanted to have a lemon fresh smell. Not the case. This candle smelled like some kind of chemical crude oil or something. Not the least bit lemon or orange. I tried several different days and each time I had to cover it and stop it was so awful smelling. Finally it went in the trash. I should have sent it back. The hazelnut did not do this. It is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Jones

customer_reviews.title: Harvest Spice = Thumbs up, Lilac Breeze = Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: The first Aira candle I ordered was the Harvest Spice, which I loved! My family loved as well. Since my mother in law liked it so much I ordered one for her after Christmas. Unfortunately, I did not enjoy the Lilac Breeze scented candle. The smell was a little too much like a bar of dial soap. However, I have already ordered my second Harvest Spice and would like to try some other scents, but I will refrain from buying Lilac Breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Camren N.

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase and not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second candle I have purchased. It was supposed to be banana nut instead it smells like linen or some flower. Their cinnamon apple is good but stay away from the other scents
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Easterling

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally friendly candles with fresh scents
customer_reviews.text: Love the scents. You can tell these are made from essential oils. They have a cotton wick which burns a bit faster than those made with synthetic wicks, but better for the environment. You just need to trim it after each use. Excellent customer service and questions promptly answered. Recommend !
customer_reviews.author: collette

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scent
customer_reviews.text: The product comes packaged really well, and the candle is really cute. The scent is very nice; the only reason I gave this 5 stars is that it is not very strong. I previously had a candle from another company in the same place and could smell it much more strongly. This actually might be a positive point from people who need a candle that's not too strong. Otherwise, all good things!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Harris

customer_reviews.title: It is strong but did not give me a headache
customer_reviews.text: I am very sensitive to smells but I love burning candles. This candle is somewhat strong but has a very pleasant smell. I decided to burn it in a large room and it was very pleasant. It has a nice blend of vanilla and lavender. I do think the vanilla smell is stronger with a subtle lavender smell. I was very pleasantly surprised that this candle did not give me a headache. I burned it for about 2 hrs and then put it out as instructed. I was very pleased with this purchase and in the future would like to try other candles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: But the smell is pretty and it fills my entire apartment nicely
customer_reviews.text: The smell is really strong. Almost too strong if its burning for a long time i need to give myself a break or ill get a headache. But the smell is pretty and it fills my entire apartment nicely. it burns very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Can’t smell it lit
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this candle. Although unlit is smells just like Love Spell, no one who has been over can smell this candle when lit. Very disappointing and not sure why this happened. It does burn evenly and without soot, so I still use it for ambiance but I was really hoping I found a healthy good smelling candle.
customer_reviews.author: New New

customer_reviews.title: The scent of the candle was strong when first lit it did not last.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four different candle scents. When I received them and I smelled each one the scents were wonderful. I lit two and the smell was amazing . I burnt them for about 2 hours. But sad to say when I lit them again the smell was almost nonexistent. Too bad because I thought I found some amazing candles for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: ... have been burning this candle every night and we love it. Our living room is two-stories high
customer_reviews.text: We have been burning this candle every night and we love it. Our living room is two-stories high, and the smell lingers throughout our whole home. I love that it's clean and naturally made, no black residue!
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a high quality candle.
customer_reviews.text: I will most likely order from this company again, because it is organic and non toxic. I ordered the banana nut bread scent. It smelled more like bananas (which was a pleasent scent, but I was in the mood for banana bread scent), lacking the spices, so I had to add my own essential oils of clove and cinnamon to make it smell more like banna bread. I am definitely interested in trying their other scents, but will have to wait on ordering more, because the price is a bit out of my comfort zone for the size of the candle. Would love to find a coupon for the next order. Overall, I have been enjoying this candle very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Stress Relief here
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed. I liked the fresh calming scent of the candle unlit. When I burned it the scent changed to a weird airfreshner smell. A totally different scent than what the candle smelled like unlit! I don't know what happened here, but a candles scent should increase, not totally change. I even had it going for a few days to see if the scent would change, and it did not. Bummer. Save your money. The Stress Relief candle only brought me stress!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, wonderful candles. I'm loving these and have bought more and will buy more. Just love the quality, scent and the fact they are environmentally- and health-conscious.
customer_reviews.author: Milica P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful candle
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle brand. It's hard to find natural candles without phthalates that are also affordable. This one is wonderful! Hazelnut latte is my favorite scent. It fills the room with its scent! It's my go to hostess gift and gift for myself! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: These candles are a great option for people with chemical sensitivity to artificial fragrances.
customer_reviews.text: My two daughters and I suffer with chemical sensitivity. Candles with artificial fragrances give us migraines. These candles are amazing! We love all of the different scents. They burn clean. We haven’t had any migraines from burning these candles.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Olszewski

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful candle!!! We got the cinnamon apple and it’s perfect for the holidays! Update: I got the pumpkin candle and love it too but it came with a plastic lid instead of the pretty metal one which was a bit of a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling Mama

customer_reviews.title: Very minimal essential oil scent
customer_reviews.text: The smell is rather strong, but instead of smelling like eucalyptus/lavender it smells like something other than a candle is burning. The candle is very pretty to look at however, it flickers a lot and may be irritating to those that are lighting it before they go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon scent is overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Got the Harvest Spice scent and the cinnamon scent is so strong it gave me a headache, made my throat and eyes burn, and even made me feel a little nauseous! Wish I had gotten a different scent.
customer_reviews.author: WiseMarshKings

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Smells awesome, seems to smell up a room more than a paraffin candle and for longer. pricey candle but used sparingly its awesome. Want to try more but budget will make that slow. so far lilac and lavender are money.
customer_reviews.author: Taco Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Love the ingredients! Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: The pumpkin pie candle smelled amazing even before being lit. I am so impressed by the intensity of the fragrance, while still being all natural! Wow. Will definitely be buying a winter holiday follow-up scent! (The only reason for 4 stars is the price. I would buy way more if they weren't at a splurge price.)
customer_reviews.author: Alby M.

customer_reviews.title: Smells good!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use woodwick candles but wanted to change to some organic candles so I bought this, totally loved it! It smells nice and relaxed, a little bit light but it is okay because it means they did not put artificial fragrance much. Loved the package too, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Khole

customer_reviews.title: Personal service was amazing.
customer_reviews.text: The scent was way too strong, but it was my fault. I didn’t see the chart for scent strength. With that being stated, the owner has been far more accommodating than he needs to be, and sent me an alternate candle.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Everything I want in a candle except I can’t smell it!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this candle is 100% soy (not a “soy blend”), it’s vegan and kosher and uses essential oils! I have been searching for this exact scent! It smells nice in the jar but does not smell much when it’s burning. :( A little pricey for the size and the fact it doesn’t make the room (never mind the apartment) smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Lemon Grass soy candle is excellent for breathing problems!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lemon grass soy candle because I have asthma,this candle is amazing at helping relieve my breathing. I will continue buying this candle and would suggest it to anyone who has asthma or chronic bronchitis. And the company is very good also to order from.....no problems at all. Their product is exactly what they said it was.
customer_reviews.author: Terri H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the fresh
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh, clean scent of this candle! It burns clean and the essential oils are so much better than synthetic fragrances. Packaging is clean and classy and the candle looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't irritate my allergies
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and strong like vanilla and doesn't irritate my asthma or cause headaches like other candles. It has lasted a long time (I bought it about 6 months ago) and still strong vanilla scent. Very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: BikeTrainRun

customer_reviews.title: 🤞🏾
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are vegan, with no toxic chemicals. But these are not long burning 🕯. I started to use mine on the jar warmer. Hopefully the scent will not burn out
customer_reviews.author: Bindu Erica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best candles I ever bought,they smell good and they last longer. Yes I would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Scent not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The candle was packaged nicely and appears to be well made. However, the scent doesn’t smell like cedar or tobacco. This was disappointing given the price of the item. The smell is not particularly unpleasant by any means, it just missed the mark entirely on either a cedar or tobacco scent which is what it was purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Honeysuckle smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Honeysuckle scent and it smelled like bug spray. Like a scented Raid. I have come across candles that I didn’t like before, but never one that smelled like actual poison. I’m giving it two stars because the presentation of the candle is really nice, but I don’t know much else about the candle because I wasn’t about to burn it any longer. Maybe the other scents are nice, but I’m not about to spend another twenty bucks to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: These smell Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: These smell Amazing!!! They burn nice and evenly and fill the house with scent pretty fast. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Scent that stays in the room for days.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle at is the season again for apple and cinnamon(Thanksgiving and Christmas time). As soon as I opened the candle I could smell the oils. I fired the candle and it actually only took like half an hour to fill the whole living room with the scent. I have with the candle a week and I have been using every day, and it has only been consumed like a quarter. As soon as this one is gone I'm buying a new one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and lingers into surrounding rooms
customer_reviews.text: A little skeptical at first this is a great smiling candle and if the other Aromas are as as this one Yankee Candles has competition
customer_reviews.author: Chris Miller

customer_reviews.title: this candle smells awesome, I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm a candle snob, and spend 50 dollars a month on candles, can't stand fake smelling candles, this candle smells awesome, I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Michele L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive, but I was willing to pay it for what I was specifically looking for with a clean burning candle. Very happy with the product and the customer service. Received quickly and the scent is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Sad 😞
customer_reviews.text: I lit the candle and it smelled amazing and that was it, the second time I lit it no amazing smell. I was really sad and disappointed. Also the candle made my mom sneeze uncontrollably 😞😞😞😞😞
customer_reviews.author: marilynn cohea

customer_reviews.title: Oh Well - Next Candle, Please :(
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, I wanted to LOVE this candle, bought especially for our brand new home. First time buying pure soy, organic candle. Unfortunately, the Stress Relief scent was a huge disappointment. I did not like it at all. It is such a beautiful candle, I am so bummed! :(
customer_reviews.author: Mil BG

customer_reviews.title: Barely any throw with this candle. The scene was ...
customer_reviews.text: Barely any throw with this candle. The scene was pleasant, but barely there. I had it in a small area - about 500 ft - and couldn't even tell. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Hibiscus Passion and Relief few weeks ago. The candle last FOREVER with wonderful scent! I have been searching for candles made with ESSENTIAL OIL. Finally found one that I'll stick with. Reasonable price and good quality. The only con of this product is the wick become mushroom-like after burning. I just cut them off and lit again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spring Vibes
customer_reviews.text: I’m hypnotized by the lilac breeze. It smells natural and real. Perfect scent for spring to bring good vibes into your home. My new favorite candle brand! Can’t wait to order a different scent to try next
customer_reviews.author: John Testa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this candle met hoped expectations I’ll be buying again
customer_reviews.author: casandra

customer_reviews.title: Not enough scent
customer_reviews.text: Cute candle and I love the jar, but the scent was very weak. The candle burned fine but not enough scent.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My first shipment arrived incomplete (just a lid) and I was immediately contacted by Aira to remedy the situation. The lemon candle arrived yesterday and it's fantastic - fresh and clean smelling! I can't wait to light it tonight. Thanks Ken and Airaco - your customer service was impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna T.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister for her birthday and she couldn’t stop raving about it ! I had to get one for myself . Packaging was nice, came quickly and the scent.. oh my heavenly! We have dogs , so the idea of a soy candle free of paraffins was a big plus !
customer_reviews.author: sage boyle

customer_reviews.title: Reno Nevada couple
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this smell. I burn this in the evening on the weekends, so the whole house smells great !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great in the jar, but no throw
customer_reviews.text: It smells beautiful in the jar—just like love spell. But, there’s really no throw with this candle. I was bummed out, it doesn’t smell like anything once you burn it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Nice but different
customer_reviews.text: Has a pleasant smell but I wouldn't quite describe it as tobacco and cedar, its more of a perfume scent. So that was slightly disappointing but its still nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, great quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a present for my daughter. She loves the smell. I got a hazelnut latte. I am getting one more.
customer_reviews.author: mom of two piano players

customer_reviews.title: Smelled great unless you light it.
customer_reviews.text: The candle smelled great in the packaging and if it wasn't lit but once lit it created absolutely no smell other than a hot wick kind of smell. I dug out the wax and used it in my wax melter and then I could smell it. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised by these candles!!! I ordered the hazelnut latte, and it’s amazing! I also got a pack of the melts in stress relief scent, they too are very good! I immediately told my sister of these and she purchased hers, and loved it! If you are all about eliminating toxins but love candle, stop here.
customer_reviews.author: LIndsey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful candle
customer_reviews.text: I got the honeysuckle scent. It smells amazing. I store the candle with the lid on and trim the wick every time. It has lasted me several months. I'm very happy with it and will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Smells worse than my Uber driver's air freshener
customer_reviews.text: Revolting pseudo-vanilla treacle that does not have a hint of cedar. It is beyond disgusting. I had to throw it out before I regurgitated my lunch
customer_reviews.author: Robert O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: You don’t have to worry about your health when you burn these candles
customer_reviews.text: Wow I will never go back to burning a non soy candle again these candles burn clean love them
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Grant

customer_reviews.title: She loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stress relief candle as a gift and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lens F.

customer_reviews.title: Best one
customer_reviews.text: I like candles but don’t want to inhale chemicals. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Money Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells great! A perfect fall candle. I love that it's soy wax and essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing. No Harsh Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: omg smells so good and doesnt give me an extreme headache from all the harsh chemicals because guess why. there is no harsh chemicals. thumbs up. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Momoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect candle for your whole house
customer_reviews.text: This candle is very good for any home. The Hazlenut smells amazing however it is a little strong for just a bedroom so it is more of a whole house candle. Very cute design and good packaging but it does burn up fairly quickly. Overall a very good purchase for anyone who likes candles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write product review but I JUST LOVE this candle. Will be ordering many more!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsi

customer_reviews.title: Could use as a decorative candle gift
customer_reviews.text: Jar opening is way to small, needed a flame lighter not a bic lighter to light candle. Personal preference now for wooden wick candles.
customer_reviews.author: cybillcarter

customer_reviews.title: Nice scents!
customer_reviews.text: I am thankful for these candles because chemical-free candles are difficult to find. First, I bought the Mistletoe scent for Christmas and, because I liked it so much, I bought the Winter Wonderland scent. I've really enjoyed these candles and will probably purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: First all natural soy candle that I have been able to find that smells delicious! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Saccameno

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla, Lavender and some other scents
customer_reviews.text: I like the candle, but I was hoping for just vanilla and lavender. Read the description closely, which I did not, because there are other scents blended in. It's not unpleasant, but it wasn't what I was looking for precisely. I still enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Willison

customer_reviews.title: It’s organic and smells super good
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells so good. I’m very happy. And it’s organic which is super important to me. I recommend these candles to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Not packaged properly
customer_reviews.text: The candle itself was nice, but when I received it, it was open and out of its packaging. It looked like the candle had leaked or been used. Needless to say, I was disappointed because I'd hoped to give it as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you love the smell of cinnamon you’ll love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great candle! Smells great, looks pretty and has a long burn time with very little smoke! I have asthma and this candle doesn’t bother me at all !!
customer_reviews.author: My Reviewer Name

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of this candle. I haven't burned the entire candle but so far so good. Definitely a great gift for someone who is sensitive to smells.
customer_reviews.author: csp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great candles - they burn well, great fragrance and you can reuse the jar and lid.
customer_reviews.author: DPH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the candle — wish it had a longer burn time!
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee

customer_reviews.title: Scent is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I expected Tobacco & Cedar to be a woodsy, earthy scent. Instead, it smells more like a cologne or perfume. Not a hint of cedar in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole O-Pries

customer_reviews.title: Pumpkin Pie
customer_reviews.text: This is my new all-time favorite candle! The scent is amazing and it fills up my entire living room. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: SLL

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle. I am not a strong believer in essential oils but this candle is amazing. It smells good, burns evenly, and makes the whole house calmer.
customer_reviews.author: heartsnstars

customer_reviews.title: Arrived so early. Love healthy non toxic candles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing like cake!!! It also arrived so early, ahead of schedule! I’m so happy to have a non toxic candle. I only wish the smell was a little bit stronger.
customer_reviews.author: xavier k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Candle!
customer_reviews.text: We liked the strength of the fragrance, and that it’s all natural. Very pleasant!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick P.

customer_reviews.title: No scent, weird smell
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I thought it would be. This candle still irritated my allergies
customer_reviews.author: Quantonio Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent!! I actually wish it was a little stronger, as you can only smell it when you are close by and I have a larger room that I wish it filled. But loooove the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Edelstein

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Beautiful packaging. Comes fast. Excellent healthy clean candles - the ribbon and matches with the scent name on it is such a great touch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very light scent, perhaps sufficient for a 10x8 room, but for any larger space the scent is lost. Very overpriced; there are much cheaper and better vanilla/lavender candles on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch A

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These candles are amazing!!!! Healthy and they smell wonderful. Best non toxic candle on the market!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural product.
customer_reviews.text: Smells delightful. No harmful chemicals for my toddler to be around. Cute packaging too!
customer_reviews.author: OrganicMomma

customer_reviews.title: Nice aroma
customer_reviews.text: I sent this gift to my niece and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like nirvana
customer_reviews.text: If nirvana (not the band) has a scent, this must be it. We will be ordering more candles from AIRA. Can't wait to have them all over the house!
customer_reviews.author: MeanAsAChihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Smells good!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! My sister loved it. Was definitely worth it. I love that the ingredients are all natural.
customer_reviews.author: Niddler shepherd

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle! Organic AND Vegan! The aroma is clean and fresh and definitely will purchase more from this line. 🤗❤🌞
customer_reviews.author: Linda Roland

customer_reviews.title: Hi I love the natural candles
customer_reviews.text: Hi I love the natural candles. They are packaged beautifully and I'm thrilled to add them to gift baskets that I'm making for a bridal shower. Customer service was excellent. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MARYr

customer_reviews.title: Not the scent I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that scent was not what I expected. I can smell lemon when I smell close to the candle. Otherwise, I just smell an inrecognizable scent of something burning.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Alft

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great candle with terrific scent! Feels good knowing it's non toxic
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied mommy

customer_reviews.title: Scent & does not hurt my lungs!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent candle! The scent is subtle yet sweet & captures fall! It also did not both my respiratory system. I will be buying this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Pabis

customer_reviews.title: It lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I lit the candle, worked all day, and looked up to still see it going strong and barely consumed. And it smells great. I keep getting compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the smell is so strong and looks like not natural
customer_reviews.text: wont buy it again. the smell is so strong and looks like not natural.
customer_reviews.author: beckymimi

customer_reviews.title: No fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this was ancient, but there was absolutely no smell. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle, great smell. Make sure to keep the wick trimmed and it will last a really long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fragrance and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful, clean burning, would make a nice gift as it good quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great non-toxic candle!
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to find a "cleaner" non toxic candle. And these candles are great. Smell is strong and nice. Will be repurchasing
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: fragrants

customer_reviews.title: Smells very good. But the aroma doesn’t really expand in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells very good. But the aroma doesn’t really expand in the whole house as much as I expected to be.

customer_reviews.title: I love these candles
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles!! The scent is absolutely delightful. I bought them because they are soy, but they are so much more than just soy!

product_meta.title: Aira Soy Candles - Organic, Kosher, Vegan, in Mason Jar w/Therapeutic Grade Essential Oil Blends - Hand-Poured 100% Soy Candle Wax - Paraffin Free, Burns 110+ Hours - Citrus & Teakwood -16 Ounces
product_meta.description:
Size:16 Ounce| Color:Citrus & TeakwoodCandles That Truly Light Up Lives
Whether during the busy holiday season or on a special date night, we all try to light our homes up the old-school way with candles of all kinds. But if you are looking for candles that well-and-truly light up your life in meaningful ways, Aira Soy Candles present the best option for you.

All Natural, 100% Vegan & Kosher
Soy candles that we bring to you use nothing but purely soy contents. Made from the purest soy vegetable oil & the finest of therapeutic grade essential oil blends, these candles are fully vegan & kosher.

No beeswax/paraffin/cheap petroleum oils/harmful chemicals are used in these soy candles. Also, it’s worth nothing that every soy candle jar we sell is hand-poured with care, precision & style!

Citrus & Teakwood
Woodsy balanced with sweet creates the perfect combination for a lovely earthy scent all can enjoy. Citrus lime & bergamot is fused with rich warm woods of cedar, sandalwood & guaiacwood

For Clean & Clear Light
As these soy candles use pure soy oil (unlike many candles available in the market), they can provide clean & clear illumination for hours at a stretch (these soy candles burn for 110+ hours, longer than any average candle). Leaving no soot/char behind, Aira Soy Candles also make sure that they remain eco-friendly, emit no toxic gases & don’t blacken up the interior of your house. Also, you can easily clean up after these candles using dish soap & warm water.

So, wait no more – just click ‘Add to Cart’ to order the gentlest & purest soy candles you can get your hands on!
feature_bullets: ORGANIC, KOSHER & VEGAN – Aira Soy Candles use pure, organic soy vegetable oil as the base for these soy candles, as opposed to common candles that use paraffin, petroleum oils or other toxic bases. Wicks are 100% cotton and lead free

THERAPEUTIC GRADE ESSENTIAL OIL BLENDS – Unlike regular candles, Aira Soy Candles employ a variety of essential oil blends for an unadulterated scent & light that stays with you for long hours – No harmful chemicals are added for scent / light / appearance purposes

CITRUS & TEAKWOOD – Woodsy balanced with sweet creates the perfect combination for a lovely earthy scent all can enjoy. Citrus lime & bergamot is fused with rich warm woods of cedar, sandalwood & guaiacwood

NO PARAFFIN – Most commercial candles use one form of petroleum products or the other, but not us! Our soy candles are purely soy oil based & contain no paraffin content – 16 oz. soy candles burn for 110+ hours to provide clean, clear light & leave no soot/smoke

NO MESS FOR YOU TO CLEAN AFTER – With no soot or char left, it’s easy to clean after – Use dish soap & warm water to wipe away traces of spilled/burnt wax – Do away with toxic candles that pollute your home & embrace the clean & eco-friendly ways of Aira Soy Candles – Just click ‘Add to Cart’ to order right now!
